= Commands =
Everything that changes the game state in any way is a Command. It can be said that a Command is a game state change unit. Commands have the following attributes:

  * `$action` Action ID
  * `$uid` ID of the user who performed the action
  * `$gid` ID of the game where the action was performed
  * `$param` Extra parameters for the action
